schema:creator: Taylor L. W., Co. Agent, Kern County
schema:description: Use of poured adobe on "Mud Concrete". ([a](/collection/ag_eng/AR-012/AR_012_2078a)) The mud was mixed in the wagon, ([b](/collection/ag_eng/AR-012/AR_012_2078b)) Filling the form, (c) Showing the forms on top of the wall, (d) End of house, wall complete. See letters of Mr. Taylor 4-22-25 and 5-5-25 and Mr. J.M. Howells 5-18-22 relative to construction.  [See other card for pictures of completed structure](/collection/ag_eng/AR-012/AR_012_1838a).
schema:keywords: .1 Materials, manufacture, tests, strength, preservation, etc.
schema:name: Ranch House Construction, Liberty Ranch, Oroville, CA. (b)
